meanings.definition: The act of chewing or grinding food with the teeth.
meanings.sent1: Healthy mastications help in digesting food properly.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the mastications of crunchy apples.
meanings.sent3: The loud mastications of my dog always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her mastications were like a rhythmic drumbeat during dinner.
meanings.sent5: The mastications of the cows in the field were a peaceful sound.

meanings.definition: The process of breaking down food into smaller pieces by the action of the jaws.
meanings.sent1: Proper mastications are essential for good digestion.
meanings.sent2: The mastications of the grinder mimic the jaw's action.
meanings.sent3: The robot's mastications of metal surprised the engineers.
meanings.sent4: The mastications of time slowly break down the walls of the ancient castle.
meanings.sent5: The mastications of the excavator turned the building into rubble.
